mapper.select: SELECT * FROM popular_search_keyword WHERE keyword_status = 'VISIBLE' ORDER BY search_count DESC LIMIT #{limit}
mapper.update: UPDATE popular_search_keyword SET search_count = search_count + 1, last_aggregated_time = NOW() WHERE keyword = #{keyword} AND keyword_status = 'VISIBLE'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO popular_search_keyword (keyword, search_count, keyword_status, last_rank_in_time, last_aggregated_time) VALUES (#{keyword}, 1, 'VISIBLE', NOW(), NOW())
